annotations.description: Here's how to make the mid-century Tiki cocktail built to serve two, the Chief Lapu Lapu, which is made with Light Cuban Rum, Dark Jamaican Rum, Passion Frui...
annotations.title: Chief Lapu Lapu - How to Make the Tiki Drink inspired by a Filipino Hero & the Sidewinder's Fang

textContent:
1.5 oz (45ml) Light Rum
1.5 oz (45ml) Dark Jamaican Rum
1 oz (30ml) Passion Fruit Syrup
1 oz (30ml) Simple Syrup
2 oz (60ml) Lemon Juice 
3 oz (90ml) Orange Juice
garnish Cinnamon Sticks (optional)

Shake with 12 oz (350ml) of crushed ice and 3-4 ice cubes. Pour unstrained into Tiki Mug or Snifter Glass. Garnish with Cinnamon Sticks. Serve with straw and stir stick. (Serves two).

https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=z10OBRcSPts
title: Chief Lapu Lapu
